entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming clear before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
